abstract: Quitting smoking can bring on a ravenous appetite. Will that be the experience for Kraft Foods, which was recently spun off from cigarette maker Altria?
lead_paragraph: Quitting smoking can bring on a ravenous appetite. Will that be the experience for Kraft Foods, which was recently spun off from cigarette maker Altria?

headline.main: Kraft Could Be Hungry for Deals, Analyst Says
